Title: Rabbit in a Snowstorm
Genre: Action, Crime, Drama, Fantasy, Sci-Fi, Thriller
Writer: Stan Lee (based on the Marvel comics by), Bill Everett (based on the Marvel comics by), Drew Goddard (created by), Marco Ramirez, Luke Kalteux (story editor), Christos N. Gage (staff writer), Ruth Fletcher (staff writer)
Actors: Charlie Cox, Deborah Ann Woll, Elden Henson, Toby Leonard Moore
Plot: Murdock and Foggy take on a mysterious wealthy client, but Murdock is convinced that there's more to the case than just the facts.
